content: After steadily declining for most of the past year the stock prices in my TSP funds have been climbing again slowly but steadily for the past couple of weeks. If you are going to blame every negative indicator in the market on Obama then you should be willing to give him credit when there are positive signs as well.

title: strange relationship

content: quote: Originally posted by BPCR45_90: After steadily declining for most of the past year the stock prices in my TSP funds have been climbing again slowly but steadily for the past couple of weeks. If you are going to blame every negative indicator in the market on Obama then you should be willing to give him credit when there are positive signs as well. The other side just can't do that BPCR. I have yet to see any of the anti-Obama folks acknowledge anything positive that President Obama has done. I think that they think, if they were to acknowledge something positive, it would make them look weak, or to look like appeasement. There is just something in the psyche of the "Right," that has always taken on the persona of John Wayne tough guy--everyone else be damned. No one starts a war--or rather, no one in his senses ought to do so--without first being clear in his mind what he intends to achieve by that war and how he intends to conduct it. Carl von Clausewitz

content: I think I have something positive for you!! They are going to let the Bush tax cuts "sunset" they have quietly asserted that this is policy. SO!! HEY!! No new taxes!! We're just going back to the Clinton tax rates...ya know the marriage penalty....the retroactive clause....the increase on capitol gains....the fifteen percent on ALL social security earnings.....back to the previous allowance for children and exemptions.....IT'LL BE GREAT!!! WON'T IT!!!! That's positive....isn't it....come on, a little help here please, where's your enthusiasm, where's your joy!!!? COME ON!!!! IT"S OFFICIAL, NO NEW TAXES!!! This IS positive, isn't it?? What?.... You think it.......well I wouldn't put it so strongly myself, I mean "sucks" is kinda strong isn't it.......not strong enough? O.K. some just can't smell the flowers for the stench....I meant delicate scent!!! Really I DID!!!

content: I think Obama is doing a fine job so far. He is closing Gitmo, letting homosexuals stay in the service, coming up with a national health care system for people who can't afford health care. He is helping the auto industry, the banks, the mortgage companies, he is appointing a new judge to the Supreme Court who will take mercy on people who are poor and uneducated, he is helping all children get a good college education. He is not getting involved in the CIA VS Nancy Perlosi affair even though one of them is being dishonest to the American people. (But hey we don't have a need to know right?). God bless President Obama. He is the man right now.
